creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: gofu background; cartoonish portrait of cross-eyed man with frowning mouth, wearing black and tan patterned kimono; dark pink shiny ground
dimension: image, sheet: 14 7/8 x 9 7/8 in. (37.78 x 25.08 cm)
markings: 九十之内 {kyūjū no nai} [Seal no. 31], 光溪之印 {Kōkei no in} [Seal no. 17]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Bust Portraits Series VII 第七期大首絵シリーズ
text: 110th design by Kōkei. Actor Onoe Shōroku II (1913-1989) as Kudō Suketsune 工藤祐経 in the play "The Felicitous Soga Encounter" (Kotobuki Soga no taimen 寿曽我対面), performed at the Kabuki Theater in November of 1988. The brothers Soga Jūrō and Gorō are trying to avenge the death of their father who was killed by the villain Suketsune.
title: Actor Onoe Shōroku II as Kudō Suketsune
